site.title: Fizzy's Lunch Lab

curriculum.name: Health
curriculum.description: Improving the physical & mental well-being of individuals & communities by increasing their knowledge or influencing their attitudes.

curriculum.name: Nutrition
curriculum.description: Understanding the importance of a healthy diet & eating habits and incorporating these habits into daily routines.

site.short_description: Fizzy's Lunch Lab educates families about the importance of good nutrition, a balanced diet, and physical activity.
site.long_description: Fizzy's Lunch Lab is a vibrant, fun and kid-friendly web-only series featuring original characters and funny stories that entertain and educate families about the importance of good nutrition, a balanced diet, and physical activity.

messages.short_description: Browse dozens of Lunch Lab recipes.
messages.long_description: Browse dozens of delicious and nutritous recipes including Potato Gnocchi and Fiesta Bean Chili.
